Perceptor::

"Master"said Perceptor by comm link by Galvatron (in a frecuency that 
just Galvatron could receive)"I have an personal idea to prove a 
small teory that  could give us a advantage against our enemies... 
but I need your permission to have a commlink with Flicker..."



--- In nbwrpg@y..., aerosmith60@c... wrote:
>  Hydras landed and his body seemed to bolt out fire from every 
vein.  He shot 
> every weapon in his arsenal at the shields.  Proot transformed into 
Rodimus 
> Prime and fired several shots. Destructor followed suit. "We must 
bring these 
> sheilds down!" (hopefully they wont last forever)
